text: Alec Smith (1949–2006) was a Rhodesian farmer and army chaplain, the son of Prime Minister Ian Smith. Alec Smith may also refer to: *Alec Smith (footballer) (1873–1908), English footballer *Alec Smith (trade unionist), British trade unionist, former general secretary of the National Union of Tailors and Garment Workers *Rupert Alec-Smith (1913–1983), historian of East Yorkshire, England ==See also== *Alic Halford Smith (1883–1958), British philosopher and Vice-Chancellor of the University of Oxford *Alex Smith (disambiguation) *Alexander Smith (disambiguation)
title: Alec Smith (disambiguation)
